title: Clipping Images with Patches
description: In this lab, we will learn how to clip an image with patches using Python's Matplotlib library. Clipping an image with patches allows you to highlight specific areas of the image, or crop the image to a specific shape.

meta.title: Image Clipping with Patches | Python Matplotlib Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to clip images using patches in Python's Matplotlib library. Highlight specific areas or crop images to custom shapes.
meta.keywords: image clipping, image patches, Python Matplotlib, image processing, image manipulation
